subject: Device suddenly not detected.
description_text:
Hi,

I purchased the SQ Pro sequential from Amazon along with the HB Pro on June 26,2025. It has worked perfectly up until this morning where now it is not detected and the LED's are white instead of the static red I had both of my  SQ Pro and HB Pro set to. Simsonn Manager recognizes my VAM Pro haptic reacors and also my HB Pro where the SQ pro is no longer detected as it has been since new. I have tested the USB cable by switching with my HB Pro and the issue remains, ruling out the USB cord as the cause, this issue is with the SQ Pro device. Now this is only less than six months old, what can you do to assist me with this issue? I have attached the invoice from Amazon detailing my purchase in pdf format, as well as a screen capture of SIMSONN Manager.

Thank you for your assistance

[cid:fd5ab9ad-1db0-4d65-9634-1bc0c230bc5b]

conversations.body_text:
Hi there,

I'm unable to view the status of my ticket and I would like to know the status. I'm still waiting for contact with regard to a resolution for my non functioning SQ Pro.

Regards,

Ted Nicholl
________________________________

Hi Ted Nicholl,  At the front bottom position of the handbrake (indicated by the arrow), there is a recovery button. Please use a toothpick to gently switch it to the other side, then reconnect the USB cable. The device will enter recovery mode. Next, go to Settings → Update → Manual Firmware Update → seq-firmware → gear-sqpro.sfu in the software, complete the update, and then run a test. After the upgrade, make sure to switch the recovery button back to its original position. You may also use the VKB tool to check the device connection status.

Good morning,

Thank you so much for the assistance. I'm pleased to report that my SQ Pro has been restored and is now functioning perfectly. Thank you very much for your stellar support, I am a very happy and satisfied customer.

Kindest Regards,

Ted Nicholl
________________________________
Very quick resolution to reinstalling firmware restoring my SQ Pro in minutes.
